PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-10562020-12-14,  ,  ,  DFO, 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Ontario Fishery Regulations, 2007
PrecisRegulations amending the ONTARIO FISHERY REGULATIONS, 2007 in order to (1) enable the use of up to three lines while fishing for carp in Fisheries Management Zones 12 to 20 within Ontario, and in a manner that reduces the risk of catch and mortality of other fish species, and (2) clarify the existing regulations as they relate to depositing bait in the water to maintain the protection against invasive species, aquatic organisms and disease while allowing low-risk activities, such as chumming with low-risk materials, to occur.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0276 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
